title: Bonus 15: Revelation- Apocalypse by Numbers
itunes:title: Bionus: Revelation- Apocalypse by Numbers
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I continue our series on the apocalyptic literature, with the second of two episodes on the earliest Christian apocalypse, the Book of Revelation. We find lots of magical numbers.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I continue our series on the apocalyptic literature, with the second of two episodes on the earliest Christian apocalypse, the Book of Revelation. We find lots of magical numbers.
itunes:subtitle: The first Christian apocalypse, part 2.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
